CommandDefinition.Name: addwarehousedeletejob
CommandDefinition.Description: Creates a job that periodically deletes data from one or more persistence layer instance.

Argument.Name: interval
Argument.Description: The time interval (in seconds) after which the action is repeated periodically

Argument.Name: tableName
Argument.Description: The table for which the data will be delete

Argument.Name: connectionType
Argument.Description: Data will be delete for the specified set of connection types

Argument.Name: constraints
Argument.Description: Constraints for the set of objects to be deleted, written in SQL

BoolOption.Name: c
BoolOption.Description: If there are constraints this parameter will lock the data in all connection types until it is deleted
